kit.leader_skill: Extreme STR Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +90%

super_attack.name: Black Power Ball
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Lowers ATK & DEF

passive_skill.name: Shattered History
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 100% up; (Forever) "Future Saga" Category allies' Ki +1, ATK 20% up and DEF 10% up; (Forever) "Time Travelers" Category allies' Ki +1, ATK 20% up and DEF 10% up; For every attack received: (Forever) DEF 20% up (up to 100%); When there is a Super Class enemy: ATK 50% up when attacking
